name: backoff-decorator
description: Exponential retry backoff library offering full jitter and decorators.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm install && npm run compile
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover -x '**/data/**' --print none _mocha 'dist/test/**/*_test.js' && npm run coverage:remap:json && npm run coverage:remap:html && npm run coverage:remap:xml && npm run coverage:report
scripts.coverage:remap:html: cd coverage && remap-istanbul -i coverage.json -o html-report -t html
scripts.coverage:remap:xml: cd coverage && remap-istanbul -i coverage.json -o coverage.xml -t cobertura
